Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Kimball

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #15 Jeffery Local and #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/93rd
ShortDescription: 15 Jeffery Local and J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temp. rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, 87th, and Jeffery due to, street blockage near Jeffery/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 130th/King Drive
ShortDescription: 34 S Mich. buses temp. rrtd NB: 130th, Bishop Ford Expwy, 115th, and Michigan; SB: Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford Expwy, 130th, and Michigan at 130th/King Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 130th/King Drive.

Northbound buses will operate via 130th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 115th, and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, 115th, Bishop Ford Expressway, 130th, and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via 91st, Macanaw, Harbor Ave. South Chicago, and Ewing due to bridge work at Ewing/92nd.
